articles.title: RBI cancels registration certificate of PC Financial Services
articles.description: Accordingly, PC Financial Services will not be able to transact the business of a NBFI
articles.content: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has cancelled the certificate of registration issued of PC Financial Services Pvt Ltd, according to an official statement.
